login.description: Access your account to view personalized content and manage your preferences.
login.label: Login

logout.description: Sign out of your account securely and return to the home screen.
logout.label: Logout

profile.description: View and edit your personal information, avatar, and account settings.
profile.label: Profile

settings.description: Customize your experience by adjusting language, notifications, and other preferences.
settings.label: Settings

defaultDescription: Welcome to Minimal – a clean and simple interface to help you stay focused. Select a menu option to get started.
